body:
While having too many administrators constitutes a security risk, having only one is also a risk especially when MFA is enforced. You should assign at least two Google Workspace super administrators for access redundancy.

This also reduces the need to share administrator accounts among users
name: Ensure at least two Google Workspace Super Admins are configured
remediationDescription: Assign another user with the Super Admin role.
description: Google Workspace accounts without admin redundancy
